channel.title: AB_Testing on Welcome, I'm Gary
channel.description: Recent content in AB_Testing on Welcome, I'm Gary

item.title: Analysis of Ads Spending
item.description: In this project, I resampling methods and statistical test (t-test, Mann-Whitney test, ANOVA) to analyze ads spending data

item.title: Mobile Game A/B Testing: Cookie Cats
item.description: In this project, I performed A/B testing to help a mobile game decide whether to change a core feature.
